answer: You can download resources from the learning programmes and use them to study offline 😎. However, you will need to connect to the internet to participate in many parts of the programmes you’re enrolled in. 🖥
answer_formatted: You can download resources from the learning programmes and use them to study offline 😎. However, you will need to connect to the internet to participate in many parts of the programmes you’re enrolled in. 🖥
question: Do students have to be online all the time?
